name: Educational background of employed adults with a bachelor's degree or higher, by major occupation: 2021
description: Educational background of employed adults with a bachelor's degree or higher, by major occupation: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_highest_degree_in_s_e_field
variableMeasured.description: Highest Degree In S E Field

variableMeasured.name: field_highest_degree_in_s_e_related_field
variableMeasured.description: Highest Degree In S E Related Field

variableMeasured.name: field_a_degree_in_s_e_or_s_e_related_field_but_not_highest
variableMeasured.description: A Degree In S E Or S E Related But Not Highest

variableMeasured.name: field_no_degrees_in_s_e_or_s_e_related_fields
variableMeasured.description: No Degrees In S E Or S E Related Fields

notes: Data include the employed, civilian, non-institutionalized population ages 16–75. Workers in non-S&E occupations include those with a bachelor's degree or higher employed non-STEM and STEM middle-skill occupations. Numbers are rounded to the nearest 100. Numbers may not sum due to rounding. Percentages may not sum to 100% because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), Public-Use File, 2021.Science and Engineering Indicators
